page.title: 09TRANSPORT
page.content: The main form of transport in Tadcaster is a car.One of the most popular types of car is the Ford Escort.The cheaper form of transport is a bike and people who live in Tadcaster and ride their bikes to work.In Tadcaster you will see transport such as a lorry because the people who work at the brewery use lorries to carry casks of beer to other breweries or pubs.At the brewery there are 2 different kinds of lorries.They are Bedfords which my dad drives,and long vehicles called articulated lorries which my dads friend drives.Buses are the main public transport in Tadcaster. They travel to Wetherby, York, Leeds, Harrogate and Selby.It costs you Â£1.20 to go to Leeds and back by bus.A taxi can only take about 4 people in unlike the bus which carries 50-60 people.
